title: Scarlet New Year Offer
summary: Scarlet, a brand under Proximus, has launched a new offer for 2025, providing increased data volumes on its mobile plans at no extra cost.

title: Proximus Global Communications Entity
summary: Proximus Group has merged BICS, Telesign, and Route Mobile to form Proximus Global Communications, combining their capabilities in IoT airtime, digital identity solutions, and CPaaS.

title: Transparency declaration on Proximus shareholding
summary: Proximus released a transparency declaration regarding its shareholding.

title: Proximus and Sagemcom test cargo sailboat in supply chain
summary: Proximus and Sagemcom are testing the use of cargo sailboats in their supply chain.

title: Fiber installation in Brussels
summary: Proximus and Digi are required to replace thousands of boxes on building facades in Brussels, adhering to a new color code (black, light gray, or terra cotta) to maintain building aesthetics. Failure to comply may result in fines.
